message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this is a fair split to get us going.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy - time is money!
Thanks for the offer, Bob, but I think we can find something a little more equitable. Time is indeed money, so let's not waste it!
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer considers the time pressure and gives us both a decent share.
Alice, this is my final offer above 50%. Take it or leave it, we're running out of time!
Okay, Bob, you drive a hard bargain. I accept.
